rotate_bar.description: Rotate the bar to adjust the direction.

clean_rotation_bar.description: Ensure the rotation bar is clean to enable smooth movement.

align_rotation_bar.description: Align the rotation bar vertically or horizontally.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the head to adjust the light direction.

clean_head.description: Clean the head of the lamp to ensure the brightness of the light.

set_head_position.description: Set the position of the head for desired light direction.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to remove the dust.

wipe_lamp_base.description: Wipe the lamp base to remove any attached dust.

clean_entire_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the base, bar, and head.

adjust_light_direction.description: Adjust the light direction by rotating both the bar and the head.

clean_whole_lamp.description: General cleaning of the entire lamp including the base, head, and rotation bar.

position_adjustment.description: Align the lamp such that light fall on the required spot by adjusting bar and head.
